title: New: Labrador Van – Helmet
body: Having caught my eye/ear with their debut track [_Opal_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17185-new-labrador-van-opal/) a couple of weeks back, Vancouver quartet **Labrador Van** have unveiled an even better new cut. _Helmet_ appears gritty and unkempt on first listen, yet with repeated plays it develops an elegant, angelic angle, centred around the fantastic delicate vocals and sugary vocal harmonies. Check out _Helmet_ below.
